channel.title: Mike Van Diem on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Mike Van Diem on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: LevelK Boards Oscar Winner Mike Van Diem’s ‘Our Girls’ (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: LevelK has boarded international sales for Oscar-winning director Mike van Diem’s upcoming Dutch feature film “Our Girls,” currently in post-production. Van Diem’s debut feature film &#822
